headline: Are Investors Missing the Bigger Picture After Southwest Shares Jumped 7% This Week?
summary: Curious whether Southwest Airlines is trading at a bargain or if the market's missing something? You're not alone, as plenty of investors are trying to figure out if now is the time to climb aboard or wait for a better entry point. The stock has seen a notable 7.3% jump over the last week and a 4.4% gain for the past month, after a bit of a rocky ride this year with returns still down -2.1% year-to-date. There is extra buzz around Southwest lately because of ongoing developments in the...
